library.description: Multifunctional JavaScript router solves the problem of routing your application, providing full control over the route. It can work either by itself or as a part of other framework, such as Backbone, in which it could be an excellent substitute for the standard Backbone.Router and even Backbone.View. Just try it.
library.name: Pilot

library.description: Micro client-side router inspired by the Express router (~1200 bytes)
library.name: Page.js
